name: Sweater
appearance: "It's a blue sweater that had the number 12 stitched on it."

name: Chair
appearance: "It's a wooden chair with only 3 legs."
feel: "Someone had deliberatly snapped off one of the legs."

name: Journal
appearance: "The final entry states that the time should be hours then minutes then seconds (H-M-S)."
feel: "The cover is worn and several pages are missing."

name: Bowl of soup
feel: "It has cooled down to room temerature."

name: Clock
appearance: "The hour hand is pointing towards the soup
feel: the minute hand towards the chair
smell: and the second hand towards the sweater."
column5: "The battery compartment is open and empty."
